author: NBC News
title: Coronavirus live updates: Trump pushes plan to gradually reopen U.S. as China increases Wuhan death toll
description: President Donald Trump is pushing a plan to remove restrictions across the U.S. as China raises the coronavirus death toll in Wuhan by 50 percent.
content:
Coronavirus testing must double or triple before U.S. can safely reopen, experts say
Testing for the coronavirus would have to be at least doubled or tripled from its current levels to allow for even a partial reopening of America's economy, public health ex… [+5049 chars]
